Description:
Detects suspicious user agent strings user by hack tools in proxy logs

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Hack Tool User Agent
Query: (c-useragent="*(hydra)*" OR c-useragent="* arachni/*" OR c-useragent="* BFAC *" OR c-useragent="* brutus *" OR c-useragent="* cgichk *" OR c-useragent="*core-project/1.0*" OR c-useragent="* crimscanner/*" OR c-useragent="*datacha0s*" OR c-useragent="*dirbuster*" OR c-useragent="*domino hunter*" OR c-useragent="*dotdotpwn*" OR c-useragent="*FHScan Core*" OR c-useragent="*floodgate*" OR c-useragent="*get-minimal*" OR c-useragent="*gootkit auto-rooter scanner*" OR c-useragent="*grendel-scan*" OR c-useragent="* inspath *" OR c-useragent="*internet ninja*" OR c-useragent="*jaascois*" OR c-useragent="* zmeu *" OR c-useragent="*masscan*" OR c-useragent="* metis *" OR c-useragent="*morfeus fucking scanner*" OR c-useragent="*n-stealth*" OR c-useragent="*nsauditor*" OR c-useragent="*pmafind*" OR c-useragent="*security scan*" OR c-useragent="*springenwerk*" OR c-useragent="*teh forest lobster*" OR c-useragent="*toata dragostea*" OR c-useragent="* vega/*" OR c-useragent="*voideye*" OR c-useragent="*webshag*" OR c-useragent="*webvulnscan*" OR c-useragent="* whcc/*" OR c-useragent="* Havij*" OR c-useragent="*absinthe*" OR c-useragent="*bsqlbf*" OR c-useragent="*mysqloit*" OR c-useragent="*pangolin*" OR c-useragent="*sql power injector*" OR c-useragent="*sqlmap*" OR c-useragent="*sqlninja*" OR c-useragent="*uil2pn*" OR c-useragent="*ruler*" OR c-useragent="*Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; pt-PT; rv:1.9.1.2) Gecko/20090729 Firefox/3.5.2 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)*")
